education_text.0: In the s Liedtke studied for a diploma degree in mathematics at the      Bielefeld University Bielefeld UniversityIn the s Liedtke studied for a diploma degree in mathematics at the      Bielefeld University Bielefeld UniversityIn April 1999, he took up the System Architecture Chair at the      redirect    University of Karlsruhe University of Karlsruhe
